siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Set clocks
frontmatter.description: Recognize limits, be deliberate and prepare for what comes next. There's always more that could be done and a new time will come. Set clocks to mark time and transition to what's next.

frontmatter.title: Mental schedule prep
frontmatter.description: Set out with right outcomes in mind, recognize the unwavering progression of time.

frontmatter.title: Structure and themes
frontmatter.description: Good structure supports many themes. Build the right structures to keep moving, building momentum, while rotating the themes.

frontmatter.title: Next start momentum
frontmatter.description: Prepare for the _next start_ and recognize there will be always be more. Be ready to start strong, rather than eking nominal returns out of the end of the previous day.

frontmatter.title: Prioritize people
frontmatter.description: The pandemic has only exacerbated, not caused, these conditions. Use the tools available to connect with most meaningful people in a personal manner.

frontmatter.title: Ideas and connections
frontmatter.description: It's difficult to build in time for brainstorming and connecting with others. It's made harder when working alone, and the pandemic has exasperated the conditions.

frontmatter.title: Declutter diligence
frontmatter.description: It takes continued effort to focus on the right things. With continual calls for attention in other directions, it's easy to let those consume too much attention and time.

frontmatter.title: Approach with development perspective
frontmatter.description: Make things better. The world will not call upon the unseen potential. Find new stories.

frontmatter.title: Accept reality, act deliberately
frontmatter.description: Don't try to squeeze productivity in. Use time with family well, choose how to spend time, and act deliberately.

frontmatter.title: Bigger strides
frontmatter.description: Utilize the time effectively by taking swings in areas that look like potential opportunities. Make the swings worthwhile, and go after the right opportunities.
